name: profitability
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the fact that something produces or is likely to produce a profit: The company needs to return to profitability very soon. They are reorganizing the company in order to improve profitability. See
profitable
More examplesFewer examplesThey are hoping to improve overall profitability.She expressed doubts about the future profitability of the stores.They have set a new plan to achieve profitability.
